subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The victory ended a two-game losing streak for Oklahoma against the Longhorns and improved Sooners Coach Bob Stoops’s record to 6-3 against Texas Coach Mack Brown.
snippet: The victory ended a two-game losing streak for Oklahoma against the Longhorns and improved Sooners Coach Bob Stoops’s record to 6-3 against Texas Coach Mack Brown.
